prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook emphasizes rapid development, allowing users to build AI applications quickly by focusing on desired outcomes rather than low-level programming details.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}
